Command.Name: GetSellerInfo
Command.CommandText: SELECT TOP 10 SellerId FROM dbo.EDI_Seller_BasicInfo WHERE SellerId <> @SellerId ORDER BY selleriD desc

Command.Name: GetSellerInfo2
Command.CommandText:
SELECT TOP 10 SellerId, SellerName FROM dbo.EDI_Seller_BasicInfo WHERE SellerId <> @SellerId ORDER BY selleriD desc
SELECT SellerId, SellerName FROM dbo.EDI_Seller_BasicInfo WHERE SellerId = @SellerId

Command.Name: UpateSellerInfo
Command.CommandText: update dbo.EDI_Seller_BasicInfo set SellerName = @SellerName where SellerId = @SellerId
